Usage¶

Run programm¶

To run programm, you need next python libs: peewee, pyautogui, sphinx. To start the test you only need to run main.py file.

(.venv) $ python3 main.py

Check programm¶

To check programm with tests, you need next python libs: peewee, pytest, pyautogui, sphinx. To check the programm you only need to use pytest on tests.py file.

(.venv) $ pytest tests.py

Pseudo_manual functions¶

Functions used for imitation of user in tests.

pseudo_manual.imitate_right()¶

Imitates person who using keyboard and writes right parametrs(those, who dont create exeptions or loops in input). Used for test_ask_questions

Returns:

Nothing, just imitates keyboard user.

pseudo_manual.imitate_wrong()¶

Imitates person who using keyboard and writes different wrong parametrs(those, who create exeptions or loops in input) and then the right one. Used for test_ask_questions_2.

Returns:

Nothing, just imitates keyboard user.

pseudo_manual.imitate_insert()¶

Imitates person who using keyboard and writes different wrong parametrs(those, who create exeptions or loops in input) and then the right one. Used for test_insert.

Returns:

Nothing, just imitates keyboard user.

Interrogation functions¶

Functions used for imitation of user in tests.

interrogation.ask_questions()¶

Starts the questioning. Takes list of questions and answers from pre-formed db and puts them into terminal in human-readable form. Takes answers and parametrs from input() and on their basis gives a decision about user: is he replicant or not. Also creates global replicancy for taking answers from threads in tests.

Returns:

Nothing.

interrogation.check_insert(min, max)¶

Checks user input with given parametrs. Input always must be int, min and max is a range for qualified answers. Also creates global result for taking answers from threads in tests.

Parameters:

  • min (int) – Creates a lower boundary for numbers, after any input less than min function will ask for input again.

  • max (int) – Creates a high boundary for numbers, after any input more than max function will ask for input again.

Returns:

Result of correct input.

Return type:

int

interrogation.offset_magnitude(bpm, hr, bl, pd)¶

Checks if given parametrs are out of normal bounds. Parametrs represent different kinds of human subconsious behavior, every time parameter goes out of normal bounds, function register that and correct the offset of mood by some margin and returns magnitude of emotions after answer.

Parameters:

  • bpm (int) – Breaths per minute that interviewee done.

  • hr (int) – Number of interviewee’s beats of heart.

  • bl (int) – Blush level of interviewee.

  • pd (int) – Size of interviewee’s pupils in mm.

Returns:

Magnitude of emotions.

Return type:

float

Load_question function and classes¶

Classes and function to create db with questions for VK test.

load_questions.CreateQuestionDB()¶

Creates set of predefined questions.

Returns:

Nothing.

class load_questions.VKTest(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class to repsesent the question, answers and their weight. Inherited from peewee.Model for db creation.
